About the Company: Tinplate Company Of India Ltd is the largest indigenous producer of tin coated and tin free steel sheets in India.TCIL is the only indigenous manufacturer of value-added Tinplate and TFS for processed food, battery, dairy product, beverage and soft drink crown caps in both single reduced and double reduced forms. The product range of the company includes Electrolytic Tinplate (ETP) Line- Single Reduced Tinplates, Open Top Sanitary Cans (Otsc), Tin Free Steel, Double Reduced Tinplate Sheets.Cold Rolling Mill (CRM) Products- Hr Pickled Coils, Full Hard Coils, Temper Rolled/ Double Reduced (Dr) Coils.
